text: Olympus µ Tough is a family of compact digital cameras from Olympus Corporation. Among the models in the family are the 12 megapixel µ Tough-3000 and μ Tough-8000 cameras. They are specified to be shock- and waterproof. == See also == * Olympus Tough TG-4 *Olympus Tough TG-5 *Olympus Tough TG-6 == References == Category:Olympus digital cameras
title: Olympus µ Tough
